name: Dinner Tonight: Shrimp Pasta with Chili and Lemon
description: Every airplane I set foot on these days ends up delayed some way, somehow. What is my problem? I feel cursed. Like just last night, my flight was supposed to deposit me with ample time to to come home, relax,...
recipeIngredient: Small pinch of red pepper flakes, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Over medium heat, heat the oil and cook the garlic and chili flakes until fragrant but not browned, about 2 minutes. Add the shrimp and cook until just warmed through, about 2 minutes, longer if starting with raw. Season with salt and pepper.
Meanwhile, bring a pot of salty water to boil, and cook the past until al dente. Reserve some of the pasta cooking water.
